title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend -  August 31st, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend -  August 31st, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.  

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek. It's the elements issue celebrating the 150th year of the periodic table. 

-Jeremy Keehn describes how the issue came together

-Peter Coy explains why the periodic table is more important than ever

-Kate Krader on how nitrogen is changing how you drink coffee

-Austin Carr introduces an element that is more expensive than diamonds

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
